items.title: Israel admits mistakes over medic killings in Gaza
items.description: Israeli forces shot dead 15 emergency workers in a convoy of ambulances near Rafah on 23 March.

items.title: India's rivers are home to 6,000 dolphins - but they are in trouble
items.description: Gangetic and Indus river dolphins are found in over two-dozen rivers in India.

items.title: US cancels visas for South Sudanese over deportation dispute
items.description: The African nation is "taking advantage" of the US by not accepting its citizens, says the top US diplomat.

items.title: No wigs please - the new rules shaking up beauty pageants
items.description: Wigs and beauty contests are big business in Ivory Coast, but the industry is facing change.

items.title: Anti-Trump protests in cities across US declare 'hands off'
items.description: Thousands of protesters have gathered for the most visible opposition movement of Trump's second term.
